projects.title: Full Stack Ecommerce Website
projects.description: Built an eCommerce website with React, Next.js, and Sanity. Users can place orders and see order history.

projects.title: Full Stack Blog Website
projects.description: Used React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and GraphQL to build a Blog Website with featured and recent posts, categories.

projects.title: Full Stack MERN Website
projects.description: Used React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to build a simple social media Website.

projects.title: E-Commerce Shopping Cart
projects.description: Built the E-commerce shopping cart with React, Redux, and TypeScript. Users can add products to the shopping cart and create an order.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: Used React to build a memory game.

projects.title: React Recipe Web
projects.description: Used React and Next.js to build a recipe web.

projects.title: React Bulletin Board
projects.description: Built a bulletin board with React and Firebase. Users need to log in to see and create new posts.

projects.title: React Reading List
projects.description: Used React to make a simple reading list. Users can add and delete the book item.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript to build a snake game. Users use the arrow key to change the direction.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript to build a simple tic-tac-toe game.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Built a shopping website with Vue, Firebase, and Bootstrap. Users need to log in to add products to the shopping cart.
